main.name: Jakob Manne
main.description: I am currently working for Cutters, the fastest growing hairdresser firm in the Nordics.
main.bio: Hi, I am a software developer who enjoys being part of the entire value chain from idea to production. Currently, I am working at Cutters, where our goal is to digitalize and automate all manuall tasks except the haircut. As one of two software developers in company, I am involved in everything from developing new features to supporting the entire value chain in the company. I have experience working in large enterprises as well as startups and on my free time I enjoy trying out new technologies. I have a goal of starting to write blog articles on Medium in 2020, so follow along :D
main.contactmessage: If you would like to contact me, please reach out by email.

education.description: One exchange semester at Rice University, Houston, USA via Grunderskolen. Title of my master thesis was, What characterizes companies that implement cross-industry innovation?

education.school: Western Norway University of Applied Sciences
education.description: Awards at the Department of Computing, Mathematics and Physics: Award for best bachelor project report. Project topic was “Digital Healthcare Forms”.  Social environment award for contributing to creating a good social environment at the department.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
